website_summaries.verdict: A basic yet reliable mower that won't break your budget. If you don't need extra bells and whistles and want a great deal, this is the one to get.
pros: a solid buy for the budget-conscious and those with small, even yards
cons: It sometimes hesitates to start, but pushing the primer button usually helps
Not fancy, but for the price, you may not mind
Chugs a bit going over uneven ground

customer_reviews.title: ... 6 hours on this machine and it has performed great, easy start and handle
customer_reviews.text: I have about 6 hours on this machine and it has performed great, easy start and handle. I had one problem after the first 2 hours, the blade came off the engine. After checking the assembly and set-up instructions, there was no warning to check the blade for security. However, checking further in the manual on page 11 section 4, Blade Care, Step 8 , refers to the proper torque for the blade bolt. After retightening the bolt, I have had no further problem. It is suggested that a note be placed in the Set-up instructions so that a proper check, as recommended, be performed before use.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Came in a damaged box. The gas cap stem ...
customer_reviews.text: Came in a damaged box. The gas cap stem was bent and cracked. It's plastic so I was able to tighten the gas cap anyway. No real instructions for a non mechanical person, but my son-in-law stopped by and showed me that the reason I couldn't start it was because the handle was dropped for shipping and the blades couldn't turn. He adjusted it for me and the mower started right up! Cut my small yard in less that 45 minutes. So far, I'm liking it...
customer_reviews.author: Cornell Ulshafer

customer_reviews.title: One big complaint
customer_reviews.text: Every time I finish cutting the grass, I turn the mower on its side and scrape the caked clippings from beneath the mower. When I do it with this mower, oil leaks from the engine. This has never happened to me with any other mower before, including one I used for 19 years. And this mower is still new, only used a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas W. Deacon

customer_reviews.title: Best Lawnmower I ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, yet sturdy! Came 99.9% assembled and I was using it 15 minutes after it arrived. Best lawnmower I have ever owned. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much ready to go right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much ready to go right out of the box. There were just a few minor things to adjust like the handle and wheel height but other than that just add oil, gas and go! I replaced my old electric mower with this mower and it was the best thing I ever did. This has cut my mowing time in half. No more hateful cords to struggle with. So far I've had no problems with it starting...very dependable. Has always started on the first pull. I've had it for a month and see how it works over time. So far I've been very happy with this mower's performance.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Cuts the grass, self propelled kind of lacking.
customer_reviews.text: I have had no issues with this mower that were not self induced, i.e forgetting gas or waiting to long to mow. However, even with these bone head errors this mower has run like a dream. Its self propel system seems to only sort of work, however has I have never owned a self propelled mower my expectations may have been a bit high, so I did not take any stars off for being cheap in the past and letting my dreams be better than reality with a self propelled mower. All in all, a solid purchase. Also, definitely read the instructions for gassing and priming, as with most mowers, it can be a bit finicky there.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Runnels

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Went with the extended warranty because I didnt have a whole lot of faith, but we're going on second year with this mower! We store it in a building and take good care of it, but it does mow some rougher than ideal patches - anywhere tractor can't reach!
customer_reviews.author: emma

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small yards
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for small yards. Come completely put together and was absolutely thrilled being a single 50 year old female 💯💯💯
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Missing an important screw, have to give a bad review until that’s fixed
customer_reviews.text: For some reason the screws to secure the handle in place at the bottom are just put in the box loosely. The box showed up open and with a small hole in the bottom. Everything is there except the second screw I need to secure the handle. Including a photo of the one that isn’t missing. Can’t use the thing until I get a replacement because it’s not supported enough and I believe it will break. Can’t figure out how to get a replacement screw... if I choose the missing parts option it wants me to return the whole mower. Please help me get the correct screw and I’ll update my rating.
customer_reviews.author: troublef

customer_reviews.title: Cheap trash
customer_reviews.text: Less rhan 2 months and us falling apart. Cant prime it because leaks oil. Hard start. Never would cut close to ground. Save your money and buy a better qualiry machine.
customer_reviews.author: Brehan

customer_reviews.title: Nice mower at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Great mower, fires right up on the first pull. Super easy assembly. The engine is strong and doesn’t bog down, even in really thick grass. I find these basic mowers so much better than the fancy self propelled ones, which add a lot of weight, and is something else to break. This mower pushes very easy with the tall rear wheels. I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BlueMandelbrot

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: Put on the handle, pour in the oil and gas, pull the string and go. Mulches well. Tackled the tall grass better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Monsoon Mom

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: This mower is undaunted by my dense lawn. It grinds off emerging cypress knees. It is very easy to start. If yours won’t crank when you first get it, pull up on the handle until it is fully extended. The mower is shipped with the handle extending into the mower blade area for compaction.
customer_reviews.author: anna ethington

customer_reviews.title: Seems good, but parts lost.
customer_reviews.text: The mower itself seems fine. Easy to assemble out of the box and nice that it came with oil. The downgraded 3* review is because pieces either were not included or came loose in shipping. If they aren't secured well enough to get to their destination intact, please just put them in the bag, so they aren't lost. Just took it out of the box today and already ordering replacement parts.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Schneiderman

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Value
customer_reviews.text: This machine has been in service for two seasons now. Well designed and well built. Engine starts on first or second pull and has been very reliable. A quality machine at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: zeetrade

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product and when received it. Was missing parts
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Spikes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: still works. inexpensive and works for my yard which takes about 1 hour to cut front and back
customer_reviews.author: joe. joe who? JOE MAMA

customer_reviews.title: Its a must have i love mine and i love how light it is.
customer_reviews.text: Oh my god this was the best thing so far i must say i love my mower it cuts wonderful and light weight and runs so good...
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Troutman

customer_reviews.title: Quality mower, good value
customer_reviews.text: First use impressions: starts easily, cuts deep grass without a hitch. Nice and and light, a great feature for a push mower. But, as usual for so many manufacturers, the setup instructions are pitiful, with tiny, confusing diagrams.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Good mower, poor packaging.
customer_reviews.text: The shipping box was badly damaged during shipment. The handle hardware came loose and a handle stove bolt was lost in transit. Also, a front wheel mounting was badly bent. Fortunately, I have a machine shop on site and was able to repair these two issues. The completed mower started on the first stater pull and the mower is working fine. The design is simple and sturdy and the mower should work a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Concerned engineer

customer_reviews.title: Scratched handle but runs great.
customer_reviews.text: The handle was scratched when it arrived. The grass was too long to wait to send it back so I just set it up and got going. It is working great so far, easy to start and use.
customer_reviews.author: Krista C.

customer_reviews.title: So far ok
customer_reviews.text: So far nice. Didn't get to use it long because we are in Michigan and it was toward the end of summer when we got it.
customer_reviews.author: Patsy

customer_reviews.title: Powerful mower
customer_reviews.text: Powerful mower for a good price. This cut through some tall grass that hasn't been mowed in several months with ease. Cranks easily as well.
customer_reviews.author: johnh1803

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: This mower is working great! The instructions for assembling the handle were a little strange but if you have any mechanical skills you can get through it. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: seasick sailor

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works well cranks right up used it to mow thick grass and then under brush
customer_reviews.author: rowdytackett

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I have used it twice. Assembly was easy. Starts up on first pull. Cut through some tall and thick grass. Chewed up small tree branches. I am happy with this purchase so far. Now let's see how long it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great mower, great value. Arrived on time, as described, and packed well!
customer_reviews.author: 112 LSR

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Great mower but the frame where the grass would shoot out came caved in about 6-8 inches and had to pull it back out and reshape by hand so I could get the blade to turn. Other than that , the mower itself runs great.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Burton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very well built. Only used it once so far but was very impressed by the power and handling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The perfect for lawn and leaves.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic machine. Love it! Came 99.9% assembled in box only needed to add gas and oil (oil provided). Super great gas mileage and love the side discharge for mulching leaves. Good price too. Couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Great little mower!
customer_reviews.text: This little machine runs like a r@ped ape. This mower travels threw anything you give it! Love it and can’t wait to mow!
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Handle Screws are stripped
customer_reviews.text: Assembled the mower, went to put on the handle screws with the plastic handle tightener at the bottom of the handle base, they are completely stripped and won't tighten. Had to call the manufacturer within 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Moncherry

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this last year. Took ten minutes to put together and starts with one pull just about every time and I mow over everything short of tree trunks with it. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: dragon man

customer_reviews.title: I'm so pleased with my 3 year old 21-inch Yard Machine that ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm so pleased with my 3 year old 21-inch Yard Machine that I'm giving it to my newly wed son and ordering the exact same model. Straight forward simple design with Briggs & Stratton reliability. Perfect formula.
customer_reviews.author: jmejr

customer_reviews.title: but overall seems like a pretty basic lawn
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes it doesn’t start up the first time, but overall seems like a pretty basic lawn mower
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More mower for the money
customer_reviews.text: I really like the huge primer button and the large easy open gas cap
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Usually they die (like hitting a big root and bending the shaft) because of my own fault, will continue to buy the Yard Machine brand over others.
customer_reviews.author: scubaman

customer_reviews.title: I have been using this mower for over 10 years ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this mower for over 10 years. It is light but solid and I use it to mow 3 acres. It will fit anyones needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cuts great!!
customer_reviews.text: cuts great!!! My husband only has full use of one arm and he can crank it easily!! Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Tara Lynn Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Junker wouldn't start. Cheap plastic wheel adjustment parts. ...
customer_reviews.text: Junker wouldn't start. Cheap plastic wheel adjustment parts. Box it came in was so thin that mower was damaged upon arrival. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: jobarnes4353 @gmail

customer_reviews.title: clean castings and especially like the OHV design
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quickly, came with initial oil, engine is very well made, clean castings and especially like the OHV design. As advertised, 2nd pull and the engine started.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hartmann

customer_reviews.title: Caution missing parts!!!
customer_reviews.text: Lawnmower came without multiple parts- missing both carriage bolts for the handle and also missing the gas cap. Very dissatisfied
customer_reviews.author: Brensgp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: assembly was easy and lawn mower is a breeze to use.
customer_reviews.author: SpiDerPiG

customer_reviews.title: I love the Yard Machine mower
customer_reviews.text: I love the Yard Machine mower. It starts the first pull and runs like a champion. And the price on Amazon couldn't be matched in the box stores. I will always get a Yard Machine push mower.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Hord

customer_reviews.title: Great little mower!
customer_reviews.text: It runs very smoothly and is easy to turn cause of the big wheels on the back and it cuts great; you can also use it as a mulching mower, both ways.
customer_reviews.author: Smiley

customer_reviews.title: What a great mower, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: What a great mower, especially for the price. One pull and it starts right up, easy to push and handle. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: brian bazzle

customer_reviews.title: Harder to start than my last Yard Machines mower
customer_reviews.text: Harder to start than my last Yard Machines mower which lasted 14 years.
customer_reviews.author: Bubboo

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy with this lawnmower
customer_reviews.text: I have had many lawnmowers over my 81 years and this is the least user friendly serviceable one I have ever had. I have not figured out yet how to change the oil without it running all over the cover. The spark plug cover is hard to remove. The manual is of little help. I could go on but this give the general dissatisfaction I have with this machine.
customer_reviews.author: gwj

customer_reviews.title: Opened box parts missing.
customer_reviews.text: Box was opened and re taped bolts missing for handle. Did not come with instructions or oil for the mower.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Pinkerton

customer_reviews.title: Only used it twice so far, no major issues ...
customer_reviews.text: Only used it twice so far, no major issues, but for some reason the mowing height adjustment does not work as described in the manual. The lowest position is actually in the middle holes (and is not sufficiently low for spring scalping of bermuda grass). As you move the lever to either side away from the middle, the height increases.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: I was happy with this mower at first
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with this mower at first. It was fall and I used the mower about 2x, however after sitting about 6 weeks it didn't start. Or even try to start. The owners manual was no help at all. My guess is that the Powermore engine is a delicate piece of garbage. The model with the Briggs is likely better. Now I have to deal with Yard Machines to try and find a solution. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda or Lee

customer_reviews.title: shameful treatment of product
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so the machine itself is fine, once we got all the oil off. This machine came in a box that had been dropped and crushed. Multiple layers of plastic shrink-wrap and tape were applied to the outside to try and hide the damage. Oil-soaked box, oil soaked everything since the fluid container was crushed and applied itself liberally to the inside and soaked through to the outside as well. Owners manual unreadable. "Spare" parts everywhere, what else can be said? Very disappointed, would appreciate a new manual, new fluid, and an apology, none of which I know I'll ever get. Shame on whoever does this and gets away with it. Zero recommendation will ever come from this experience.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Hagen

product_meta.title: Yard Machines 140cc 21-Inch Push Mower
product_meta.description: The Yard Machines push lawn mower has a powerful 140cc OHV gas engine and will accommodate small to medium size yards. This has a 21-inch cutting width and dual-lever height adjustment. The Mower is equipped with a side discharge and mulching capability for your every lawn mowing need. This lawn mower is light in weight and has 7 x 11-inch wheels for easy maneuverability. Backed by a 2-year limited warranty.
feature_bullets: Powered by a durable 140cc OHV engine
Equipped with a 21" steel deck with dual-lever height adjustment
This Yard Machines Push Lawn Mower is perfect for mowing small to medium sized yards
Features 7 x 11-inch wheel size for easy turns

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars116 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
